description: Wrexham are now level on points with second-placed Wycombe Wanderers in League One as they earn a hard-fought victory over Rotherham United at the Stok Racecourse.
title: Wrexham 1-0 Rotherham United: Sam Smith goals sees hosts close gap to top two
title_page: Wrexham 1-0 Rotherham United: Sam Smith goals sees hosts close gap to top two - BBC Sport
maintext:
Wrexham have lost four of their last five league games against Rotherham United (W1), though did win the reverse fixture 1-0 in October.
Rotherham United have won each of their last two away league games against Wrexham, as many victories as across their prior 14 visits to the Racecourse Ground combined (D4 L8).
Wrexham are winless across their last four home league games (D2 L2), their longest run on home soil in the EFL since an eight-match stint between October and December 2007.
